TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventLogInstaller extends System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller

summary.span: 使您能够安装和配置应用程序在运行时所读取或写入的事件日志。

span.span: Allows you to install and configure an event log that your application reads from or writes to when running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由[Installutil.exe （安装程序工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)时安装事件日志。The is used by the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md) when installing an event log. 类可以仅在本地计算机上安装事件日志。The class can install event logs only on the local computer. 使用类当你的应用程序将事件日志写入; 不需要使用你的应用程序的事件日志安装程序从事件日志中读取。Use the class when your application writes to an event log; it is not necessary to use an event log installer for your application to read from an event log. 应用程序和服务应写入应用程序日志或自定义日志。Applications and services should write to the Application log or a custom log. 设备驱动程序应该写入系统日志。Device drivers should write to the System log. > [!NOTE] > 安全日志是只读的。The Security log is read-only. 安装程序创建的事件源中指定的属性，它为事件日志中指定的寄存器属性。The installer creates the event source that you specify in the property and registers it for the event log specified in property. 此行为是类似于调用上组件。This behavior is similar to calling on the component. 使用和方法将事件写入到事件日志。Use the and methods to write events to an event log. 必须指定事件源写入事件;必须创建并写入与源的第一项之前配置的事件源。You must specify an event source to write events; you must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 这允许操作系统以刷新其注册的事件源的列表和它们的配置的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configurations. 如果操作系统没有刷新其事件源的列表，并且尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 可以配置新的源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. 可以创建现有事件日志或新的事件日志的事件源。You can create an event source for an existing event log or a new event log. 创建新的源为新的事件日志时，系统注册该日志的源，但直到第一个条目写入不创建该日志。When you create a new source for a new event log, the system registers the source for that log, but the log is not created until the first entry is written to it. 若要安装事件日志，请创建继承的项目安装程序类，并设置到类`true`。To install an event log, create a project installer class that inherits from , and set the for the class to `true`. 您的项目内创建为每个事件日志将写入到应用程序，并且将实例添加到你的项目安装程序类。Within your project, create an for each event log that your application will write to and add the instance to your project installer class. 当[Installutil.exe （安装程序工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)是调用，它会查看。When the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md) is called, it looks at the . 如果它是`true`，该工具会安装中的所有项项目安装程序与关联的集合。If it is `true`, the tool installs all the items in the collection that are associated with your project installer. 如果是`false`，此工具将忽略项目安装程序。If is `false`, the tool ignores the project installer. 修改的其他属性之前或之后添加到实例项目安装程序，但在之前运行该安装程序工具的集合。You modify other properties of an either before or after adding the instance to the collection of your project installer, but before the installer tool runs. 必须设置属性，如果你的应用程序将写入事件日志。You must set the property if your application will be writing to the event log. 使用注册一个新的或现有的事件日志; 新的源不使用若要更改现有的源。Use to register a new source for a new or existing event log; do not use to change an existing source. 类不会修改现有源以匹配指定的安装属性的配置属性。The class does not modify the configuration properties of an existing source to match the specified installation properties. 方法将引发异常，如果属性与为另一个事件日志的计算机上注册的源名称相匹配。The method throws an exception if the property matches a source name that is registered for a different event log on the computer. 方法不会注册源，如果属性与已注册相同的事件日志中指定的源名称相匹配属性。The method does not register the source if the property matches a source name that is already registered for the same event log specified in the property. 您可以注册事件源的本地化的资源文件为事件类别和消息字符串。You can register the event source with localized resource files for your event category and message strings. 你的应用程序可以写入事件日志项使用资源标识符，而不指定实际的字符串。Your application can write event log entries using resource identifiers, rather than specifying the actual string. 事件查看器使用的资源标识符来查找并显示基于当前语言设置的本地化的资源文件中的相应字符串。The Event Viewer uses the resource identifier to find and display the corresponding string from the localized resource file based on current language settings. 可以注册一个单独的文件的事件类别、 消息和参数插入字符串，也可以注册相同的资源文件，所有三种类型的字符串。You can register a separate file for event categories, messages, and parameter insertion strings, or you can register the same resource file for all three types of strings. 使用， ， ，和属性来配置要本地化的项写入事件日志的源。Use the , , , and properties to configure the source to write localized entries to the event log. 如果你的应用程序直接将字符串值写入事件日志，您不需要设置这些属性。If your application writes strings values directly to the event log, you do not need to set these properties. 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，必须配置源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目写入，则必须注册两个单独的源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 例如，配置一个源的资源文件，以及如何将该源中的方法来编写使用资源标识符添加到事件日志条目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，然后使用在该源方法将字符串直接写入事件日志使用的源。Create a different source without resource files and then use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. 通常情况下，不调用的方法类在代码中; 它们通常被称为只能由 Installutil.exe。Typically, you do not call the methods of the class from within your code; they are generally called only by Installutil.exe. 该工具会自动调用在安装过程中的方法。The tool automatically calls the method during the installation process. 如有必要，它退出故障，通过调用生成了异常的对象的方法。It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling the method for the object that generated the exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置新的事件源的安装属性。The following code example sets the installation properties for a new event source. 代码示例设置的源名称和事件日志名称，并添加到集合。The code example sets the source name and the event log name, and adds the to the collection. [!code-cpp[EventLogInstaller#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogInstaller/CPP/eventloginstaller.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogInstaller#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogInstaller/CS/eventloginstaller.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogInstaller#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogInstaller/VB/eventloginstaller.vb#1)]

span.span: Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CategoryCount { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CategoryCount : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置类别资源文件中类别的数目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of categories in the category resource file.

value.span: 类别资源文件中的类别的数目。

span.span: The number of categories in the category resource file.
The default value is zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用和属性在写入事件时已本地化的类别字符串。Use the and properties to write events with localized category strings. 如果在写入事件时提供一个类别，事件查看器显示事件条目的类别。The Event Viewer displays the category for an event entry, if you supply a category when you write the event. 事件日志类别是应用程序定义的字符串，用于帮助筛选事件，或提供有关事件的信息。Event log categories are application-defined strings that help filter events, or provide information on an event. 例如，你的应用程序可以定义分隔不同类别的不同组件或不同的操作。For example, your application can define separate categories for different components or different operations. 事件类别是可选的;如果你的应用程序不使用类别，则不要设置和属性。Event categories are optional; if your application does not use categories, do not set the and properties. 有关如何定义事件消息和生成事件资源文件的详细信息，请参阅平台 SDK 文档中的"消息编译器"主题[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置新的事件源的安装属性。The following code example sets the installation properties for a new event source. 代码示例设置事件源名称、 事件日志名称和本地化的事件文本的资源文件。The code example sets the event source name, event log name, and resource file for localized event text. [!code-cpp[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/VB/source.vb#1)] 代码示例使用下面的消息文本文件，内置的资源库 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 消息文本文件是从其创建的消息资源文件的源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 消息文本文件定义的资源标识符和类别、 事件消息和参数插入字符串的文本。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CategoryResourceFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置包含源的类别字符串的资源文件的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the resource file that contains category strings for the source.
The path of the category resource file.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用和属性在写入事件时已本地化的类别字符串。Use the and properties to write events with localized category strings. 如果在写入事件时提供一个类别，事件查看器显示事件项的类别。The Event Viewer displays the category for an event entry if you supply a category when you write the event. 事件日志类别是应用程序定义的字符串，用于帮助筛选事件，或提供有关事件的信息。Event log categories are application-defined strings that help filter events, or provide information about an event. 例如，应用程序可能具有不同的组件或不同的操作的单独类别。For example, your application might have separate categories for different components or different operations. 事件类别是可选的;如果你的应用程序不使用类别，则不要设置和属性。Event categories are optional; if your application does not use categories, do not set the and properties. 有关如何定义事件消息和生成事件资源文件的详细信息，请参阅平台 SDK 文档中的"消息编译器"主题[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置新的事件源的安装属性。The following code example sets the installation properties for a new event source. 代码示例设置事件源名称、 事件日志名称和本地化的事件文本的资源文件。The code example sets the event source name, event log name, and resource file for localized event text. [!code-cpp[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/VB/source.vb#1)] 代码示例使用下面的消息文本文件，内置的资源库 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 消息文本文件是从其创建的消息资源文件的源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 消息文本文件定义的资源标识符和类别、 事件消息和参数插入字符串的文本。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

span.span: An to use as a template for the .

summary.span: 复制安装时所需要的 组件（与事件日志对应）的属性值。

span.span: Copies the property values of an component that are required at installation time for an event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过指定的组件`component`参数必须是; 否则为将引发异常。The component specified by the `component` parameter must be an ; otherwise, an exception is thrown. 通常情况下，不调用的方法从在代码中; 它们通常称为仅可由[Installutil.exe （安装程序工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md). Installutil.exe 使用它来设置的属性值对的值的现有。 is used by Installutil.exe to set the property values for the to the values of an existing . 如果的，它是传递中为空字符串 ("")，必须设置为安装程序在执行之前有效的值的属性。If the of the that is passed in is an empty string (""), you must set the property to a valid value before the installer executes.

span.span: The specified component is not an .
-or-

exception.span: 指定组件的 或 属性为 或空。

span.span: The or property of the specified component is either or empty.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Install(class System.Collections.IDictionary stateSaver) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Install (stateSaver As IDictionary)

param.name: stateSaver
param.span: ，用于保存执行回滚或卸载操作所需的信息。

span.span: An used to save information needed to perform a rollback or uninstall operation.

summary.span: 执行安装并将事件日志信息写入注册表。

span.span: Performs the installation and writes event log information to the registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将事件日志信息写入到注册表中，并将事件日志关联与由指定的日志属性。The method writes event log information to the registry, and associates the event log with a log that is specified by the property. 如果尚不存在日志 （和指定源），创建的日志，并将新的源与之相关联。If the log does not already exist (and a source is specified), creates a log and associates the new source with it. 通常情况下，不调用的方法从在代码中; 它们通常称为仅可由[Installutil.exe （安装程序工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md). 该工具会自动调用方法在安装过程中写入事件日志正在安装的注册表信息。The tool automatically calls the method during the installation process to write registry information that is associated with the event log being installed. 安装是事务性的因此如果在安装期间安装项目的任何组件的故障，则所有以前安装的组件将回滚到安装前的状态。Installation is transactional, so if there is a failure of any installation project component during the installation, all the previously-installed components are rolled back to their pre-installation states. 这通过调用每个组件实现方法。This is accomplished by calling each component's method. 使用注册一个新的或现有的事件日志; 新的源不使用若要更改现有的源。Use to register a new source for a new or existing event log; do not use to change an existing source. 类不会修改现有源以匹配指定的安装属性的配置属性。The class does not modify the configuration properties of an existing source to match the specified installation properties. 方法将引发异常，如果属性与为另一个事件日志的计算机上注册的源名称相匹配。The method throws an exception if the property matches a source name that is registered for a different event log on the computer. 方法将跳过注册源，如果属性与已注册相同的事件日志中指定的源名称相匹配属性。The method skips registering the source if the property matches a source name that is already registered for the same event log specified in the property. 应用程序的安装例程使用的项目安装程序属性来自动维护有关已安装的组件的信息。An application's install routine uses the project installer's property to automatically maintain information about the components that have already been installed. 此状态信息，传递给作为`stateSaver`工具安装每个参数，将持续更新。This state information, which is passed to as the `stateSaver` parameter, is continuously updated as the tool installs each . 通常情况下，不需要为你的代码可以显式修改此状态信息。Usually, it is not necessary for your code to explicitly modify this state information.

exception.span: 安装程序尝试使用的平台不是 Windows NT 4.0 或更新版本。

span.span: The platform the installer is trying to use is not Windows NT 4.0 or later.

exception.span: 已经为另一个事件日志注册了 属性中指定的名称。

span.span: The name specified in the property is already registered for a different event log.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsEquivalentInstaller(class System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller otherInstaller) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsEquivalentInstaller (otherInstaller As ComponentInstaller) As Boolean

span.span: The installer to compare.

summary.span: 确定安装程序和指定的另一个安装程序是否引用同一个源。

span.span: Determines whether an installer and another specified installer refer to the same source.

returns.span: 如果当前安装程序和由 参数指定的安装程序安装或卸载相同的源，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this installer and the installer specified by the parameter would install or uninstall the same source; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，不调用的方法从在代码中; 它们通常仅由调用安装程序工具 (Installutil.exe)。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the Installer tool (Installutil.exe).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Log { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Log : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要向其设置源的日志的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the log to set the source to.
The name of the log.

value.span: 这可以是 Application、System 或一个自定义的日志名称。

span.span: This can be Application, System, or a custom log name.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用要关联中指定的源属性与现有的日志或本地计算机上的新日志的属性。You can use the property to associate the source you specify in the property with either an existing log or a new log on the local computer. [Installutil.exe （安装程序工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)使用此信息来将源映射到计算机的注册表中的日志。The [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md) uses this information to map the source to the log in the computer's registry. 应用程序和服务应写入应用程序日志或自定义日志。Applications and services should write to the Application log or a custom log. 设备驱动程序应该写入系统日志。Device drivers should write to the System log. 若要向事件日志写入条目，必须创建源，并将其注册到事件日志。To write entries to an event log, you must create a source and register it with an event log. 事件源一次只能写入到一个日志。An event source can only write to one log at a time. 安装程序使用的值属性可作为有效项源的事件日志中注册你的应用程序。The installer uses the value of the property to register your application with the event log as a valid source of entries. 如果不指定安装程序运行之前的日志名称，安装程序将注册到应用程序日志源。If you do not specify a log name before the installer runs, the installer registers your source to the Application log. 如果指定新的源和现有的日志时，安装程序创建新的事件源，并将其与您指定的日志关联。If you specify a new source and an existing log, the installer creates a new event source and associates it with the log you specify. 如果指定新的源和新的日志，安装程序将在注册表中，新的日志与相关联的新的源，但直到第一个条目写入不创建该日志。If you specify both a new source and a new log, the installer associates the new source with the new log in the registry, but the log is not created until the first entry is written to it. 操作系统将事件日志存储为文件。The operating system stores event logs as files. 当你使用或方法来创建新的事件日志关联的文件存储在指定计算机上的 %SystemRoot%\System32\Config 目录中。When you use or the method to create a new event log, the associated file is stored in the %SystemRoot%\System32\Config directory on the specified computer. 通过追加的前 8 个字符设置的文件名称".evt"文件扩展名的属性。The file name is set by appending the first 8 characters of the property with the ".evt" file name extension. 使用注册一个新的或现有的事件日志; 新的源不使用若要更改现有的源。Use to register a new source for a new or existing event log; do not use to change an existing source. 类不会修改现有源以匹配指定的安装属性的配置属性。The class does not modify the configuration properties of an existing source to match the specified installation properties. 方法将引发异常，如果属性与为另一个事件日志的计算机上注册的源名称相匹配。The method throws an exception if the property matches a source name that is registered for a different event log on the computer. 方法不会注册源，如果属性与已注册相同的事件日志中指定的源名称相匹配属性。The method does not register the source if the property matches a source name that is already registered for the same event log specified in the property. 有关详细信息的事件日志和源的行为，请参阅类的文档和属性。For more detailed information about the behaviors of event logs and sources, see the class documentation for the and properties.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MessageResourceFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.MessageResourceFile : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.FileNameEditor, System.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.FileNameEditor, System.Design, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置资源文件的路径，该文件包含源的消息格式字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the resource file that contains message formatting strings for the source.
The path of the message resource file.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可配置事件日志源写入本地化的事件消息。Use the property to configure an event log source to write localized event messages. 事件消息是应用程序定义的字符串，描述向用户事件。Event messages are application-defined strings that describe the event to the user. 你的应用程序可以编写使用资源标识符的事件日志条目。Your application can write event log entries using resource identifiers. 资源标识符的消息中编制索引。A resource identifier indexes a message located in the . 事件查看器使用的资源标识符来查找并显示基于当前语言设置的本地化的资源文件中的相应字符串。The Event Viewer uses the resource identifier to find and display the corresponding string from the localized resource file based on current language settings. 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，必须配置的事件源。The event source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 使用方法写入本地化的项配置与消息资源文件的源。Use the method to write localized entries for a source configured with a message resource file. 如果你的应用程序写入事件消息字符串直接，而不是在已本地化的资源文件中，使用资源标识符未设置属性。If your application writes event message strings directly, rather than using a resource identifier in a localized resource file, do not set the property. 如果属性不是本地计算机标识符 ("。")，.NET Framework 假定的资源文件在远程计算机上。If the property is not the local computer identifier ("."), the .NET Framework assumes that the resource file is on a remote computer. 如果属性值包含驱动器号、 资源文件被假定为上\\ \\< machinename\>\\< 驱动器\>$ 共享 (例如， \\\server\c$)。If the property value contains a drive letter, the resource file is assumed to be on the \\\\\\$ share (for example, \\\server\c$). 如果值包含字符串 %systemroot%，假定的资源文件位于\\ \\< machinename\>\admin$ 共享 (例如， \\\server\admin$)。If the value contains the string %systemroot%, the resource file is assumed to be on the \\\\\admin$ share (for example, \\\server\admin$). 有关如何定义事件消息和生成事件资源文件的详细信息，请参阅平台 SDK 文档中的"消息编译器"主题[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置新的事件源的安装属性。The following code example sets the installation properties for a new event source. 代码示例设置事件源名称、 事件日志名称和本地化的事件文本的资源文件。The code example sets the event source name, event log name, and resource file for localized event text. [!code-cpp[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/VB/source.vb#1)] 代码示例使用下面的消息文本文件，内置的资源库 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 消息文本文件是从其创建的消息资源文件的源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 消息文本文件定义的资源标识符和类别、 事件消息和参数插入字符串的文本。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ParameterResourceFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置资源文件的路径，该文件包含源的消息参数字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the resource file that contains message parameter strings for the source.

value.span: 消息参数资源文件的路径。

span.span: The path of the message parameter resource file.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可配置事件日志源写入本地化的事件消息与插入参数字符串。Use the property to configure an event log source to write localized event messages with inserted parameter strings. 每个本地化的事件消息中指定属性可以包含插入字符串的占位符。Each localized event message specified in the property can contain placeholders for insertion strings. 这些占位符用于指定的位置和资源标识符内的事件消息的独立于语言的字符串。These placeholders are used to specify the position and resource identifier for a language-independent string within the event message. 事件查看器替换中对应的字符串的占位符和格式化本地化的事件项的事件日志消息。The Event Viewer replaces the placeholders with the corresponding strings from the and formats the event log message for the localized event entry. 例如，消息文本文件中的以下部分定义的参数占位符的字符串：For example, the following section of a message text file defines a string with a parameter placeholder: ``` MessageId = 1501 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = COMPONENT_STARTING Language=English Component %%6050 is starting. . ``` 在参数资源文件中，插入字符串必须使用定义的资源标识符对应于该占位符，如下所示：Within the parameter resource file, the insertion string must be defined with the resource identifier that corresponds to the placeholder, as shown below: ``` MessageId = 6050 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = COMPONENT_NAME_MSGID Language=English TRIGGER.EXE . ``` 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，必须配置的事件源。The event source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 使用方法写入本地化的项配置与消息资源文件的源。Use the method to write localized entries for a source configured with a message resource file. 如果你的应用程序事件消息字符串将直接写入到事件日志，或者如果你不包含消息未设置带有参数插入占位符属性。If your application writes event message strings directly to the event log, or if your does not contain messages with parameter insertion placeholders, do not set the property. 有关如何定义事件消息和生成事件资源文件的详细信息，请参阅平台 SDK 文档中的"消息编译器"主题[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置新的事件源的安装属性。The following code example sets the installation properties for a new event source. 代码示例设置事件源名称、 事件日志名称和本地化的事件文本的资源文件。The code example sets the event source name, event log name, and resource file for localized event text. [!code-cpp[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/VB/source.vb#1)] 代码示例使用下面的消息文本文件，内置的资源库 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 消息文本文件是从其创建的消息资源文件的源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 消息文本文件定义的资源标识符和类别、 事件消息和参数插入字符串的文本。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. 具体而言，定义为资源标识符 1004年的消息使用的资源标识符 5002 定义的参数字符串占位符。Specifically, the message defined for resource identifier 1004 uses a placeholder for a parameter string defined for resource identifier 5002. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Rollback(class System.Collections.IDictionary savedState) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Rollback (savedState As IDictionary)

param.name: savedState
param.span: 包含计算机的安装前状态。

span.span: An that contains the pre-installation state of the computer.

summary.span: 通过回滚安装过程写入注册表的事件日志信息，将计算机还原为安装前的状态。

span.span: Restores the computer to the state it was in before the installation by rolling back the event log information that the installation procedure wrote to the registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法撤消的影响方法。The method undoes the effects of the method. 安装项目中的任何组件的安装失败时调用。 is called if the installation of any component in the installation project fails. 方法创建，或设置事件日志和事件源的属性。The method creates or sets the properties for an event log and event source. 删除事件日志和源，或者将预先存在的源的属性重置为其安装前的值。 either deletes the event log and source or resets the properties of a pre-existing source to its pre-installation values. 通常情况下，不调用的方法从在代码中; 它们通常称为仅可由[Installutil.exe （安装程序工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md). 该工具将调用方法，当这个或另一个组件未安装，以撤消安装过程中所做的任何更改时。The tool calls the method, when this or another component has failed to install, to undo any changes that the installation process has already made. 应用程序的安装例程使用的项目安装程序属性来自动维护有关已安装的组件的信息。An application's install routine uses the project installer's property to automatically maintain information about the components that have already been installed. 此状态信息，传递给作为`savedState`参数，将持续更新，因为该工具将返回每个。This state information, which is passed to as the `savedState` parameter, is continuously updated as the tool rolls back each . 通常情况下，不需要为你的代码可以显式修改此状态信息。Usually, it is not necessary for your code to explicitly modify this state information.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Source { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Source : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要在日志中注册的源名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the source name to register with the log.

value.span: 要在事件日志中注册为项源的名称。

span.span: The name to register with the event log as a source of entries.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件源指示什么来记录事件。The event source indicates what logs the event. 它通常是应用程序的名称或大型应用程序内的一个组件的名称。It is often the name of the application, or the name of a component within a large application. 安装程序使用的值属性可作为有效项源的事件日志中注册你的应用程序。The installer uses the value of the property to register your application with the event log as a valid source of entries. 新的源名称不能与现有的源名称或现有的事件日志名称匹配。A new source name cannot match an existing source name or an existing event log name. 每个源只能写入到一个事件日志一次;但是，你的应用程序可以使用多个源写入多个事件日志。Each source can only write to one event log at a time; however, your application can use multiple sources to write to multiple event logs. 例如，你的应用程序可能需要多个源配置为使用不同的事件日志或不同的资源文件。For example, your application might require multiple sources configured for different event logs or different resource files. 应用程序和服务应写入应用程序日志或自定义日志。Applications and services should write to the Application log or a custom log. 设备驱动程序应该写入系统日志。Device drivers should write to the System log. 如果不指定安装程序运行之前的日志名称，安装程序将注册到应用程序日志源。If you do not specify a log name before the installer runs, the installer registers your source to the Application log. 如果指定不存在日志的名称，请将系统注册到该日志，但直到第一个条目写入不创建该日志。If you specify the name of a log that does not exist, the system registers the to that log, but the log is not created until the first entry is written to it. 使用注册一个新的或现有的事件日志; 新的源不使用若要更改现有的源。Use to register a new source for a new or existing event log; do not use to change an existing source. 类不会修改现有源以匹配指定的安装属性的配置属性。The class does not modify the configuration properties of an existing source to match the specified installation properties. 方法将引发异常，如果属性与为另一个事件日志的计算机上注册的源名称相匹配。The method throws an exception if the property matches a source name that is registered for a different event log on the computer. 方法不会注册源，如果属性与已注册相同的事件日志中指定的源名称相匹配属性。The method does not register the source if the property matches a source name that is already registered for the same event log specified in the property. 有关详细信息的事件日志和源的行为，请参阅类的文档和属性。For more detailed information about the behaviors of event logs and sources, see the class documentation for the and properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Uninstall(class System.Collections.IDictionary savedState) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Uninstall (savedState As IDictionary)

param.name: savedState
param.span: 包含计算机的安装前状态。

span.span: An that contains the pre-installation state of the computer.

summary.span: 通过从注册表中移除事件日志信息来移除安装。

span.span: Removes an installation by removing event log information from the registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性值是`Remove`，则方法删除源和关联的日志安装程序创建如果和属性指定创建新的事件日志和源。If the property value is `Remove`, the method deletes the source and the associated log that the installer created if the and properties specified the creation of a new event log and source. 通常情况下，不调用的方法从在代码中; 它们通常称为仅可由[Installutil.exe （安装程序工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)在卸载模式。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md) in uninstall mode. 该工具会自动调用方法还原受影响的在安装程序安装前的状态系统的部分。The tool automatically calls the method to restore the parts of the system that were affected by the installation to their pre-installation states. 这包括删除与正在卸载的事件日志关联的注册表信息。This includes deleting registry information that is associated with the event log being uninstalled. 应用程序的项目安装程序卸载例程使用属性来自动维护有关已卸载的组件的信息。An application's uninstall routine uses the project installer's property to automatically maintain information about the components that have already been uninstalled. 此状态信息，传递给作为`savedState`工具卸载每个参数，将持续更新。This state information, which is passed to as the `savedState` parameter, is continuously updated as the tool uninstalls each . 通常情况下，不需要为你的代码可以显式修改此状态信息。Usually, it is not necessary for your code to explicitly modify this state information.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Configuration::Install::UninstallAction UninstallAction { System::Configuration::Install::UninstallAction get(); void set(System::Configuration::Install::UninstallAction value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，以指示 Installutil.exe（安装程序工具）在卸载时应删除事件日志还是保留其安装状态。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the Installutil.exe (Installer Tool) should remove the event log or leave it in its installed state at uninstall time.

value.span: 值之一，它指示在卸载 时将事件日志保留在何种状态。

span.span: One of the values that indicates what state to leave the event log in when the is uninstalled.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安装事件日志，可以根据需要连接到现有的日志。When you install an event log, you can optionally connect it to an existing log. 如果这样做，您必须决定是否在日志应返回到安装前的状态，还是应保持在其当前的安装后状态。If you do so, you must decide whether the log should return to its pre-installation state, or remain in its current, post-installation state. 如果你选择事件日志返回到安装前的状态，则不会还原到在安装时的事件日志条目的更改。If you elect to return the event log to its pre-installation state, changes to the event log entries at installation are not restored. 可以重置与关联的事件日志属性到安装前的值。You can reset only the event log properties that are associated with the to their pre-installation values.

span.span: contains an invalid value.

exception.span: 只有 和 才是此属性的有效值。

span.span: The only valid values for this property are and .
